review_text: I was told by my host that this restaurant pride themselves for their service and I totally agree. For privacy, one should reserve a private room. Since it is steamboat style, I would say the soups are fairly tasty.

The crew are super attentive and prompt service. A great hotpot place with reasonable pricing. Pretty ordinary menu thou. Best avoid outlets at xidan and wangfujin as they are super crowded and wait time can be hours; try branches that are outside the city central i.e. zhong loh branch

The food was so-so (in part because they didn't have English menus so we weren't sure what we were ordering). We loved that they have manicures, snacks, and iced tea while you wait for a table! When we sat down, nobody spoke English and we had no idea how/what to eat. Our hotel owner had written in Chinese that we...
